data.eml:eml: Rediscovery and re-description of Ischnocnema nigriventris (Lutz, 1925) (Anura: Terrarana: Brachycephalidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Berneck, Bianca V. M., Targino, Mariane, Garcia, Paulo Christiano De Anchietta (2013): Rediscovery and re-description of Ischnocnema nigriventris (Lutz, 1925) (Anura: Terrarana: Brachycephalidae). Zootaxa 3694 (2): 131-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3694.2.2
